assertion.value: E.G., M.D., M. Chateau and A.M. are employees of Carbios. V.T. has been an employee of Carbios since January 2019. C.M.T., H.T., V.T., M.-L.D., S.D., I.A., S.B. and A.M. have filed patents WO 2018/011284 and WO 2018/011281 for ‘Novel esterases and uses thereof’. H.T., M.-L.D., S.D., A.M., M.D. and M. Chateau have filed patent WO 2017/198786, ‘A process for degrading plastic products’, for protection of part of the work described herein. Confidentiality agreements prevent them from disclosing any newly submitted declaration of invention. All other authors declare no competing interests.
